#summary This page provide a description of the grammar that the user follows when running the program.

= Introduction =


= High-Level Commands =
  * Tag
  The tag command prefaces the creation of a tag. It must be immediately followed by one of the [Tags acceptable tags].

  * End
  The end command follows the completion of a section. It specifies that the tag indicating the end of the section should be entered. It must be immediately followed by one of the [Tag acceptable tags].
